DataLoader¶

class dataloader.DataLoader(from_csv=None, target_labels=None, datapath=None, image_dimensions=None, csv_label_col=None, csv_image_col=None, time_steps=None)[source]¶

Loads images and labels from dataset path.

Parameters:
  • from_csv – if true, images will be extracted from csv file
  • target_labels – list of target label values/strings
  • datapath – location of image dataset
  • image_dimensions – initial dimensions of raw training images
  • csv_label_col – index of label value column in csv
  • csv_image_col – index of image column in csv
get_data()[source]¶
Returns:list of images and list of corresponding labels from specified location
